traits.Fey Ancestry: The wood elf has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the wood elf to sleep.
traits.Keen Hearing and Sight: The wood elf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
traits.Mask of the Wild: The wood elf can attempt to hide even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

actions.Multiattack: The wood elf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
